Traduction description: ID de pret dans notre echantillon
Description: ID of loan in our sample

Traduction description: Variable cible (1 - Client avec difficultes de paiement: il a eu un paiement en retard plus de x jours sur au moins l'un des premiers versements du pret dans notre echantillon, 0 - tous les autres cas)
Description: Target variable (1 - client with payment difficulties: he/she had late payment more than X days on at least one of the first Y installments of the loan in our sample, 0 - all other cases)

Traduction description: Identification si le pret est cash ou revolving
Description: Identification if loan is cash or revolving

Traduction description: Sexe du client
Description: Gender of the client

Traduction description: Flag Si le client possede une voiture
Description: Flag if the client owns a car

Traduction description: Drapeau si le client possede une maison ou un appartement
Description: Flag if client owns a house or flat

Traduction description: Nombre d'enfants du client
Description: Number of children the client has

Traduction description: Revenu du client
Description: Income of the client

Traduction description: Montant de credit du pret
Description: Credit amount of the loan

Traduction description: Rente de pret
Commentaire interet: Traduction zarb mais LightGBM dit que c'est dans le top10
Description: Loan annuity

Traduction description: Pour les prets e la consommation, c'est le prix des marchandises pour lesquelles le pret est accorde
Description: For consumer loans it is the price of the goods for which the loan is given

Traduction description: Qui accompagnait le client lorsqu'il demandait le pret
Description: Who was accompanying client when he was applying for the loan

Traduction description: Type de revenu des clients (homme d'affaires, travail, conge de maternite,e)
Description: Clients income type (businessman, working, maternity leave,etc.)

Traduction description: Niveau de l'education la plus elevee que le client a atteint
Description: Level of highest education the client achieved

Traduction description: Statut familial du client
Description: Family status of the client

Traduction description: Quelle est la situation du logement du client (louer, vivre avec les parents, etc.)
Description: What is the housing situation of the client (renting, living with parents, etc.)

Traduction description: Population normalisee de la region oe vit le client (un nombre plus eleve signifie que le client vit dans une region plus peuplee)
Description: Normalized population of region where client lives (higher number means the client lives in more populated region)

Traduction description: L'age du client dans les jours au moment de la demande
Description: Client's age in days at the time of application
Special: time only relative to the application

Traduction description: Combien de jours avant la demande, la personne a commence l'emploi actuel
Description: How many days before the application the person started current employment
Special: time only relative to the application

Traduction description: Combien de jours avant la demande le client a-t-il change son inscription
Description: How many days before the application did client change his registration
Special: time only relative to the application

Traduction description: Combien de jours avant la demande le client a-t-il modifie le document d'identite avec lequel il a demande le pret
Description: How many days before the application did client change the identity document with which he applied for the loan
Special: time only relative to the application

Traduction description: age de la voiture du client
Description: Age of client's car

Traduction description: Le client a-t-il fourni un telephone mobile (1 = oui, 0 = non)
Description: Did client provide mobile phone (1=YES, 0=NO)

Traduction description: Le client a-t-il fourni un telephone de travail (1 = oui, 0 = non)
Description: Did client provide work phone (1=YES, 0=NO)

Traduction description: Le client a-t-il fourni un telephone e domicile (1 = oui, 0 = non)
Description: Did client provide home phone (1=YES, 0=NO)

Traduction description: Le telephone mobile etait-il accessible (1 = oui, 0 = non)
Description: Was mobile phone reachable (1=YES, 0=NO)

Traduction description: Le client a-t-il fourni un telephone e domicile (1 = oui, 0 = non)
Description: Did client provide home phone (1=YES, 0=NO)

Traduction description: Le client a-t-il fourni un e-mail (1 = oui, 0 = non)
Description: Did client provide email (1=YES, 0=NO)

Traduction description: Quel type d'occupation le client a-t-il
Commentaire interet: Loisir coeteux ? Mais doit etre peu renseigne
Description: What kind of occupation does the client have

Traduction description: Combien de membres de la famille a-t-il le client
Commentaire interet: On a deja le nb d'enfants
Description: How many family members does client have

Traduction description: Notre note de la region oe vit le client (1,2,3)
Description: Our rating of the region where client lives (1,2,3)

Traduction description: Notre note de la region oe le client vit avec la prise en compte de la ville (1,2,3)
Description: Our rating of the region where client lives with taking city into account (1,2,3)

Traduction description: Quel jour de la semaine le client a-t-il demande le pret
Description: On which day of the week did the client apply for the loan

Traduction description: Environ e quelle heure le client a-t-il demande le pret
Description: Approximately at what hour did the client apply for the loan

Traduction description: Indicateur Si l'adresse permanente du client ne correspond pas e l'adresse de contact (1 = different, 0 = meme, au niveau de la region)
Description: Flag if client's permanent address does not match contact address (1=different, 0=same, at region level)

Traduction description: Flag Si l'adresse permanente du client ne correspond pas e l'adresse de travail (1 = differente, 0 = meme, au niveau de la region)
Description: Flag if client's permanent address does not match work address (1=different, 0=same, at region level)

Traduction description: Indicateur Si l'adresse de contact du client ne correspond pas e l'adresse de travail (1 = differente, 0 = meme, au niveau de la region)
Description: Flag if client's contact address does not match work address (1=different, 0=same, at region level)

Traduction description: Flag Si l'adresse permanente du client ne correspond pas e l'adresse de contact (1 = different, 0 = meme, au niveau de la ville)
Description: Flag if client's permanent address does not match contact address (1=different, 0=same, at city level)

Traduction description: Flag Si l'adresse permanente du client ne correspond pas e l'adresse de travail (1 = differente, 0 = meme, au niveau de la ville)
Description: Flag if client's permanent address does not match work address (1=different, 0=same, at city level)

Traduction description: Indicateur Si l'adresse de contact du client ne correspond pas e l'adresse de travail (1 = differente, 0 = meme, au niveau de la ville)
Description: Flag if client's contact address does not match work address (1=different, 0=same, at city level)

Traduction description: Type d'organisation ou le client travaille
Description: Type of organization where client works

Traduction description: Score normalise de la source de donnees externe
Description: Normalized score from external data source

Traduction description: Score normalise de la source de donnees externe
Description: Normalized score from external data source

Description: Normalized score from external data source

Description: How many observation of client's social surroundings with observable 30 DPD (days past due) default

Description: How many observation of client's social surroundings defaulted on 30 DPD (days past due)

Description: How many observation of client's social surroundings with observable 60 DPD (days past due) default

Description: How many observation of client's social surroundings defaulted on 60 (days past due) DPD

Description: How many days before application did client change phone

Traduction description: Nombre de demandes de renseignements au Bureau de credits sur le client une heure avant la demande
Description: Number of enquiries to Credit Bureau about the client one hour before application

Traduction description: Nombre de demandes de renseignements au Bureau de credits sur le client un jour avant la demande (e l'exclusion d'une heure avant la demande)
Description: Number of enquiries to Credit Bureau about the client one day before application (excluding one hour before application)

Traduction description: Nombre de demandes de renseignements au Bureau de credits sur le client une semaine avant la demande (e l'exclusion un jour avant la demande)
Description: Number of enquiries to Credit Bureau about the client one week before application (excluding one day before application)

Traduction description: Nombre de demandes de renseignements au Bureau de credits sur le client un mois avant la demande (e l'exclusion une semaine avant la demande)
Description: Number of enquiries to Credit Bureau about the client one month before application (excluding one week before application)

Traduction description: Nombre de demandes de renseignements au Bureau de credits sur le client 3 mois avant la demande (e l'exclusion d'un mois avant la demande)
Description: Number of enquiries to Credit Bureau about the client 3 month before application (excluding one month before application)

Traduction description: Nombre de demandes de renseignements au Bureau de credits sur le client d'un jour (e l'exclusion des 3 derniers mois avant la demande)
Description: Number of enquiries to Credit Bureau about the client one day year (excluding last 3 months before application)

Traduction description: ID de pret dans notre echantillon - Un pret dans notre echantillon peut avoir 0,1,2 ou plusieurs credits anterieurs lies au Credit Bureau
Description: ID of loan in our sample - one loan in our sample can have 0,1,2 or more related previous credits in credit bureau

Traduction description: ID recode du credit du Bureau de credit precedent lie e notre pret (codage unique pour chaque demande de pret)
Description: Recoded ID of previous Credit Bureau credit related to our loan (unique coding for each loan application)

Traduction description: Statut du Credit Bureau (CB) a declare des credits
Description: Status of the Credit Bureau (CB) reported credits

Traduction description: Devise recodee du credit du Bureau du credit
Description: Recoded currency of the Credit Bureau credit

Traduction description: Combien de jours avant l'application actuelle Le client a-t-il postule pour le credit du Credit Bureau
Commentaire interet: LGBM3 pour le MAX, et pour le ACTIVE
Description: How many days before current application did client apply for Credit Bureau credit
Special: time only relative to the application

Traduction description: Nombre de jours de retard sur le credit CB au moment de la demande de pret connexe dans notre echantillon
Description: Number of days past due on CB credit at the time of application for related loan in our sample

Traduction description: Duree restante du credit CB (en jours) au moment de la demande de credit e domicile
Commentaire interet: LGBM3 pour le MIN et pour les ACTIVE_
Description: Remaining duration of CB credit (in days) at the time of application in Home Credit
Special: time only relative to the application

Traduction description: Jours depuis que le credit CB s'est termine au moment de la demande de credit e domicile (uniquement pour un credit ferme)
Description: Days since CB credit ended at the time of application in Home Credit (only for closed credit)
Special: time only relative to the application

Traduction description: Montant maximal en souffrance sur le credit du Bureau du credit jusqu'e present (e la date de demande de pret dans notre echantillon)
Description: Maximal amount overdue on the Credit Bureau credit so far (at application date of loan in our sample)

Traduction description: Combien de fois le credit du bureau de credit a-t-il prolonge
Description: How many times was the Credit Bureau credit prolonged

Traduction description: Montant de credit actuel pour le credit du Bureau du credit
Commentaire interet: SUM pour LGBM et ACTIVE_, MEAN, SUM et MAX pour les CLOSED_ et pour BURO_
Description: Current credit amount for the Credit Bureau credit

Traduction description: Dette actuelle sur le credit du bureau de credit
Description: Current debt on Credit Bureau credit

Traduction description: Limite de credit actuelle de la carte de credit declaree dans le Credit Bureau
Description: Current credit limit of credit card reported in Credit Bureau

Traduction description: Montant actuel en souffrance sur le credit du bureau de credit
Description: Current amount overdue on Credit Bureau credit

Traduction description: Type de credit de bureau de credit (voiture, especes, etc.)
Description: Type of Credit Bureau credit (Car, cash,etc.)

Traduction description: Combien de jours avant la demande de pret a fait la derniere information sur le credit du Bureau de credit
Description: How many days before loan application did last information about the Credit Bureau credit come
Special: time only relative to the application

Traduction description: Rente du credit du Bureau du credit
Description: Annuity of the Credit Bureau credit

Traduction description: ID recode du credit Credit Bureau (codage unique pour chaque demande) - Utilisez-le pour vous joindre e la table Credit_Bueau
Description: Recoded ID of Credit Bureau credit (unique coding for each application) - use this to join to CREDIT_BUREAU table

Traduction description: Mois de solde Par rapport a la date de demande (-1 signifie la date du solde le plus frais)
Commentaire interet: N'est qu'un numero de mois, meme si LGBM le trouve important (SIZE et MEAN)
Description: Month of balance relative to application date (-1 means the freshest balance date)
Special: time only relative to the application

Traduction description: Statut du pret du Bureau du credit pendant le mois (actif, ferme, DPD0-30, etc. [c signifie ferme, x signifie statut inconnu, 0 signifie pas de DPD, 1 signifie maximal pendant le mois entre 1-30, 2 signifie DPD 31-60 ,e 5 signifie DPD 120+ ou vendu ou radie])
Description: Status of Credit Bureau loan during the month (active, closed, DPD0-30,etc. [C means closed, X means status unknown, 0 means no DPD, 1 means maximal did during month between 1-30, 2 means DPD 31-60,etc. 5 means DPD 120+ or sold or written off ] )

Traduction description: ID du credit precedent dans le credit e domicile lie au pret dans notre echantillon. (Un pret dans notre echantillon peut avoir 0,1,2 ou plus de prets precedents en credit e domicile)
Description: ID of previous credit in Home Credit related to loan in our sample. (One loan in our sample can have 0,1,2 or more previous loans in Home Credit)

Traduction description: ID de pret dans notre echantillon
Description: ID of loan in our sample

Traduction description: Mois de solde par rapport a la date de demande (-1 signifie les informations sur l'instantane mensuel le plus frais, 0 signifie les informations de l'application - souvent ce sera la meme chose que -1 car de nombreuses banques ne mettent pas e jour regulierement les informations sur le Bureau de credit)
Description: Month of balance relative to application date (-1 means the information to the freshest monthly snapshot, 0 means the information at application - often it will be the same as -1 as many banks are not updating the information to Credit Bureau regularly )
Special: time only relative to the application

Traduction description: Terme du credit precedent (peut changer avec le temps)
Description: Term of previous credit (can change over time)

Traduction description: Versements laisses e payer sur le credit precedent
Description: Installments left to pay on the previous credit

Traduction description: Statut du contrat pendant le mois
Description: Contract status during the month

Traduction description: DPD (jours de retard) pendant le mois de credit precedent
Description: DPD (days past due) during the month of previous credit

Traduction description: DPD pendant le mois avec tolerance (les dettes avec des montants de pret faibles sont ignores) du credit precedent
Description: DPD during the month with tolerance (debts with low loan amounts are ignored) of the previous credit

Traduction description: ID du credit precedent dans le credit e domicile lie au pret dans notre echantillon. (Un pret dans notre echantillon peut avoir 0,1,2 ou plus de prets precedents en credit e domicile)
Description: ID of previous credit in Home credit related to loan in our sample. (One loan in our sample can have 0,1,2 or more previous loans in Home Credit)

Traduction description: ID de pret dans notre echantillon
Description: ID of loan in our sample

Traduction description: Mois de solde Par rapport a la date de demande (-1 signifie la date du solde le plus frais)
Description: Month of balance relative to application date (-1 means the freshest balance date)
Special: time only relative to the application

Traduction description: Solde pendant le mois de credit precedent
Description: Balance during the month of previous credit

Traduction description: Limite de la carte de credit pendant le mois du credit precedent
Description: Credit card limit during the month of the previous credit

Traduction description: Montant de retrait au guichet automatique pendant le mois du credit precedent
Description: Amount drawing at ATM during the month of the previous credit

Traduction description: Montant de retrait au cours du mois du credit precedent
Description: Amount drawing during the month of the previous credit

Traduction description: Montant des autres retraits au cours du mois du credit precedent
Description: Amount of other drawings during the month of the previous credit

Traduction description: Montant de retrait ou d'achat de marchandises pendant le mois du credit precedent
Commentaire interet: SUM et PERC par rapport aux revenus, mais le solde le donne !
Description: Amount drawing or buying goods during the month of the previous credit

Traduction description: Versement minimal pour ce mois du credit precedent
Description: Minimal installment for this month of the previous credit

Traduction description: Combien le client a-t-il paye pendant le mois sur le credit precedent
Commentaire interet: Le mean est 2x plus important quer les autres dans LGBM
Description: How much did the client pay during the month on the previous credit

Traduction description: Combien le client a-t-il paye au cours du mois au total sur le credit precedent
Description: How much did the client pay during the month in total on the previous credit

Traduction description: Montant des debiteurs pour le capital sur le credit precedent
Description: Amount receivable for principal on the previous credit

Traduction description: Montant des debiteurs sur le credit precedent
Description: Amount receivable on the previous credit

Traduction description: Montant total e recevoir sur le credit precedent
Description: Total amount receivable on the previous credit

Traduction description: Nombre de retraits e ATM au cours de ce mois sur le credit precedent
Description: Number of drawings at ATM during this month on the previous credit

Traduction description: Nombre de retraits au cours de ce mois sur le credit precedent
Description: Number of drawings during this month on the previous credit

Traduction description: Nombre d'autres retraits au cours de ce mois sur le credit precedent
Description: Number of other drawings during this month on the previous credit

Traduction description: Nombre de retraits pour les marchandises au cours de ce mois sur le credit precedent
Description: Number of drawings for goods during this month on the previous credit

Traduction description: Nombre de versements payants sur le credit precedent
Description: Number of paid installments on the previous credit

Traduction description: Etat du contrat (signe actif, etc.) sur le credit precedent
Commentaire interet: obligatoire pour les operations du noyau
Description: Contract status (active signed,etc.) on the previous credit

Traduction description: DPD (jours de retard) pendant le mois sur le credit precedent
Description: DPD (Days past due) during the month on the previous credit

Traduction description: DPD (jours passes) pendant le mois avec tolerance (les dettes avec des montants de pret faibles sont ignores) du credit precedent
Description: DPD (Days past due) during the month with tolerance (debts with low loan amounts are ignored) of the previous credit

Traduction description: ID du credit precedent dans le credit e domicile lie au pret dans notre echantillon. (Un pret dans notre echantillon peut avoir 0,1,2 ou plus de demandes de pret precedentes dans le credit e domicile, la demande precedente pourrait, mais pas necessairement e conduire au credit)
Description: ID of previous credit in Home credit related to loan in our sample. (One loan in our sample can have 0,1,2 or more previous loan applications in Home Credit, previous application could, but not necessarily have to lead to credit)

Traduction description: ID de pret dans notre echantillon
Description: ID of loan in our sample

Traduction description: Type de produit de contrat (pret en especes, pret e la consommation [pos], etc.) de la demande precedente
Description: Contract product type (Cash loan, consumer loan [POS] ,etc.) of the previous application

Traduction description: Rente de l'application precedente
Commentaire interet: MEAN et MIN et MAX pour le PREV_, MEAN, MIN et MAX pour les APPROVED_ et REFUSED_ => MEAN devrait suffire pour tout le monde
Description: Annuity of previous application

Traduction description: Pour combien de credit le client a demande sur la demande precedente
Description: For how much credit did client ask on the previous application

Traduction description: Montant de credit final sur la demande precedente. Cela differe d'AMT_Application d'une maniere que l'AMT_Application est le montant pour lequel le client a initialement demande, mais pendant notre processus d'approbation, il aurait pu recevoir un montant different - AMT_CREDIT
Description: Final credit amount on the previous application. This differs from AMT_APPLICATION in a way that the AMT_APPLICATION is the amount for which the client initially applied for, but during our approval process he could have received different amount - AMT_CREDIT

Traduction description: Acompte sur la demande precedente
Description: Down payment on the previous application

Traduction description: Prix ??du bien du bien que le client a demande (le cas echeant) sur la demande precedente
Description: Goods price of good that client asked for (if applicable) on the previous application

Traduction description: Quel jour de la semaine le client a-t-il postule pour une demande precedente
Description: On which day of the week did the client apply for previous application

Traduction description: Environ l'heure du jour, le client a-t-il postule pour la demande precedente
Description: Approximately at what day hour did the client apply for the previous application

Traduction description: Flag Si c'etait la derniere demande de contrat precedent. Parfois, par erreur de client ou de notre commis, il pourrait y avoir plus de demandes pour un seul contrat
Description: Flag if it was last application for the previous contract. Sometimes by mistake of client or our clerk there could be more applications for one single contract

Traduction description: Flag Si la demande etait la derniere application par jour du client. Parfois, les clients demandent plus de demandes par jour. Il pourrait rarement etre une erreur dans notre systeme qu'une application est dans la base de donnees deux fois
Description: Flag if the application was the last application per day of the client. Sometimes clients apply for more applications a day. Rarely it could also be error in our system that one application is in the database twice

Traduction description: Pret de micro-financement du drapeau
Description: Flag Micro finance loan

Traduction description: Taux de paiement normalise sur le credit precedent
Description: Down payment rate normalized on previous credit

Traduction description: Taux d'interet normalise sur le credit precedent
Description: Interest rate normalized on previous credit

Traduction description: Taux d'interet normalise sur le credit precedent
Description: Interest rate normalized on previous credit

Traduction description: Objectif du pret en especes
Description: Purpose of the cash loan

Traduction description: etat du contrat (approuve, annule, etc.) de la demande precedente
Description: Contract status (approved, cancelled, etc.) of previous application

Traduction description: Par rapport a la demande actuelle quand la decision concernant la demande precedente a ete prise
Description: Relative to current application when was the decision about previous application made
Special: time only relative to the application

Traduction description: Methode de paiement que le client a choisi de payer pour la demande precedente
Description: Payment method that client chose to pay for the previous application

Traduction description: Pourquoi la demande precedente a-t-elle ete rejetee
Description: Why was the previous application rejected

Traduction description: Qui a accompagne le client lors de la demande de la demande precedente
Description: Who accompanied client when applying for the previous application

Traduction description: Le client etait-il ancien ou nouveau client lors de la possibilite de postuler pour l'application precedente
Description: Was the client old or new client when applying for the previous application

Traduction description: Quel type de marchandises le client a-t-il demande dans la demande precedente
Description: What kind of goods did the client apply for in the previous application

Traduction description: etait la demande precedente en especes, pos, voiture,e
Description: Was the previous application for CASH, POS, CAR, etc.

Traduction description: etait l'application precedente X-Sell o Walk-In
Commentaire interet: Maniere de vendre le credit, a l'air de porter de la valeur pour la prediction (walk in : sans rendez-vous)
Description: Was the previous application x-sell o walk-in

Traduction description: A travers quel canal nous avons acquis le client sur l'application precedente
Description: Through which channel we acquired the client on the previous application

Traduction description: Zone de vente de la place du vendeur de la demande precedente
Description: Selling area of seller place of the previous application

Traduction description: L'industrie du vendeur
Description: The industry of the seller

Traduction description: Terme de credit precedent e l'application de la demande precedente
Description: Term of previous credit at application of the previous application

Traduction description: Taux d'interet groupe en petit moyen et eleve de l'application precedente
Description: Grouped interest rate into small medium and high of the previous application

Traduction description: Combinaison de produits detaillee de l'application precedente
Description: Detailed product combination of the previous application

Traduction description: Par rapport a la date de demande de l'application actuelle quand a ete le premier decaissement de l'application precedente
Description: Relative to application date of current application when was the first disbursement of the previous application
Special: time only relative to the application

Traduction description: Par rapport a la date d'application de l'application actuelle quand la premiere est censee etre de l'application precedente
Description: Relative to application date of current application when was the first due supposed to be of the previous application
Special: time only relative to the application

Traduction description: Par rapport a la date d'application de l'application actuelle en ce qui concerne le premier e cause de l'application precedente
Description: Relative to application date of current application when was the first due of the previous application
Special: time only relative to the application

Traduction description: Par rapport a la date de demande de l'application actuelle quand etait la derniere date d'echeance de la demande precedente
Description: Relative to application date of current application when was the last due date of the previous application
Special: time only relative to the application

Traduction description: Par rapport a la date de demande de l'application actuelle en ce qui concerne la resiliation prevue de la demande precedente
Description: Relative to application date of current application when was the expected termination of the previous application
Special: time only relative to the application

Traduction description: Le client a-t-il demande une assurance lors de la demande precedente
Description: Did the client requested insurance during the previous application

Traduction description: ID du credit precedent dans le credit e domicile lie au pret dans notre echantillon. (Un pret dans notre echantillon peut avoir 0,1,2 ou plus de prets precedents en credit e domicile)
Description: ID of previous credit in Home credit related to loan in our sample. (One loan in our sample can have 0,1,2 or more previous loans in Home Credit)

Traduction description: ID de pret dans notre echantillon
Description: ID of loan in our sample

Traduction description: Version du calendrier des versements (0 est pour la carte de credit) du credit precedent. Le changement de version de versement d'un mois e l'autre signifie qu'un certain parametre de calendrier de paiement a change
Description: Version of installment calendar (0 is for credit card) of previous credit. Change of installment version from month to month signifies that some parameter of payment calendar has changed

Traduction description: Sur quel versement nous observons le paiement
Description: On which installment we observe payment

Traduction description: Lorsque le versement du credit precedent etait cense etre paye (Par rapport a la date de demande du pret actuel)
Description: When the installment of previous credit was supposed to be paid (relative to application date of current loan)
Special: time only relative to the application

Traduction description: A quand remonte les versements du credit precedent paye (Par rapport a la date de demande du pret actuel)
Description: When was the installments of previous credit paid actually (relative to application date of current loan)
Special: time only relative to the application

Traduction description: Quel etait le montant du versement prescrit du credit precedent sur cet episode
Description: What was the prescribed installment amount of previous credit on this installment

Traduction description: Ce que le client a reellement paye sur le credit precedent sur cet episode
Description: What the client actually paid on previous credit on this installment
